My intention was not to say it was irrelevant for REST=
, as I have
tried to make that point (using the same interface applied to s=
everal
protocols other than HTTP) several times in this list.

 irrelevant to (quoting Tim)

plementation of the REST
style" - that disclaimer is what allows me to defi=
ne *my* uniform
interface in my examples as the HTTP methods."
